backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with order, design, user, access control, storage, and activity log types and maps, plus validation helpers and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles and behaviors in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, theme colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing caching strategies for assets and navigation with install, fetch, and activate handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app routing and bootstrap logic handling authentication, role checks, profile loading, and error screens.
frontend/src/components/admin/TotalQtyBr: Dialog component showing a breakdown of various quantity metrics with a computed grand total.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BlockedUser: Shows a blocked account message and allows the user to log out and clear session data.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Handles profile loading errors with retry and logout options, showing detailed error info when available.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button that integrates with Internet Identity and handles login edge cases.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Informs authenticated users without a profile and provides tools to copy their principal ID and refresh.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial admin setup allowing the first user to submit their name and initialize their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Wraps content with role-based access control and shows loading or denial screens when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/designImages/Des: Renders a table of design image mappings with design codes, names, and creation dates.
Dialog for loading and displaying a design image with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global error boundary that shows a fallback screen with error details, reload, and logout actions.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing technical error details with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Displays an inline error alert with optional retry and detailed error panel, handling stopped-canister messages.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Provides a dropdown to export orders in CSV or per-karigar PDF/JPEG formats with filtering and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Adds export options for a single karigar's daily or total orders in PDF or JPEG formats.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarE: Offers UI controls to filter orders by date or design and trigger PDF/JPEG exports using a provided callback.
frontend/src/components/karigar/AddKarig: Dialog for adding a new karigar via mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/karigar/KarigarO: Shows detailed karigar order info with image viewer access inside a dialog.
Main application shell rendering role-based navigation and layout structure with mobile and desktop menus.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Form dialog for adding or editing a master design, handling validation, karigar lookup, and save mutations.
Dialog for uploading, parsing, previewing, and importing master design files with error handling and summary reporting.
Table displaying master design mappings with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Preview table for ingested orders showing mapping status, order details, and PDF-derived indicators.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersDat: Banner warning about skipped or invalid cached orders with an option to clear local cache.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar for orders list supporting karigar, status, date range, CO/RB flags, and optional order number search.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Renders a selectable orders table with actions, RB edit controls, and row highlighting after sanitizing input orders.
frontend/src/components/orders/PartialFu: Dialog for entering partial supplied quantities per order with validation and confirmation callback.
frontend/src/components/orders/RbSupplie: Modal for editing an RB orderâ€™s total supplied quantity with validation and mutation update.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Header indicator showing backend online/offline status, refresh controls, and optional canister ID display.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Status bar reflecting online/offline state and pending offline sync queue with manual sync trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs backend health checks, classifies errors, and exposes online/offline status with refetch control.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy helper with status tracking and user-facing status labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile via a safe actor with error handling and exposes loading and resolved profile state.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Computes the user's effective app role by combining their profile role with an admin backend check.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages AuthClient lifecycle, and exposes identity, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges with backend data, sanitizes invalid entries, and manages loading and cache clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend resources like orders, designs, and activity logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with timeout, optional admin initialization, and retry rules.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and admin dashboard tab components.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates a printable HTML/PDF export of karigar orders with totals, table formatting, and iOS-safe print handling.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Exports filtered orders as a CSV file, supporting daily, karigar-wise, customer-order, and full exports with sorting.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, filling generic and karigar names and tracking mapped and unmapped entries.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent comparisons.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an order list into fixed-size batches.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes totals and karigar-wise statistics from sanitized orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Trims karigar names and substitutes 'Unassigned' when empty.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatOptionalNu: Formats optional numeric fields with fixed decimals or returns empty strings.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Creates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using its first three letters.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns an order timestamp, preferring uploadDate and converting nanoseconds to milliseconds.
Detects customer orders by checking if the type contains 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts sanitized orders by normalized design code and then order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sorts sanitized orders by formatted karigar name, then design code, then order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/validatePersiste: Validates and filters PersistentOrder objects, removing invalid entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/extractIm: Extracts embedded images from XLSX files using JSZip, assigning them to rows sequentially.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseDesi: Parses a 3-column Excel sheet and matches each row with an embedded image to produce design-image mappings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from a SheetJS workbook, normalizing headers and extracting design code, generic name, and karigar name.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Extracts orders from an Excel workbook with flexible column matching, numeric validation, and row-level warnings and errors.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads the SheetJS library if needed and reads an Excel file into a validated workbook object.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master design file parsing to either the Excel or PDF parser with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Selects the correct parser for orders based on file type and returns parsed orders plus warnings.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads PDF.js from CDN and extracts structured text lines from each page of a PDF.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design entries from extracted PDF text by locating headers and splitting rows into design, generic name, and karigar name.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using table-row or section-header formats, maintaining karigar context and validating fields.
Parses a PDF table row into a PersistentOrder, extracting fields with validation. Returns a fully populated order object or null on format errors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements an IndexedDB wrapper for caching orders, master designs, and queued sync batches. Provides CRUD helpers for offline storage and ingestion queueing.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that uploads queued offline orders in batches and updates sync status. Handles retries, progress logging, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing orders with filters, tabs, metrics, and bulk actions. Integrates data fetching, caching, and dialogs for editing and viewing orders.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DesignImagesPag: UI for uploading, parsing, validating, and saving design image mappings. Supports Excel parsing and saving mappings to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Manages master design mappings with search, add, edit, and import actions. Displays designs in a table and supports adding karigars.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides UI for admins to create users, manage approvals, and block or unblock accounts using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows karigar orders with filtering, approval handling, cache management, and bulk delivery actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding and an Internet Identity login button.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Initializes the first admin by storing a bootstrap token and refreshing actor queries.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles file-based order ingestion, parsing, master design mapping, previews, and batched uploads.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays staff dashboards with tabbed order views, filters, activity logs, and editing dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Lists unmapped design codes with search and provides a dialog to add new master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors such as stopped canister or network issues and extracts safe diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user-friendly error messages using bootstrap classifications and decoding logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for Master Design Admin.
